name: ContinuousLinearMap.hasDerivAtFilter
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u
inst✝² : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
F : Type v
inst✝¹ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
x : 𝕜
L : Filter 𝕜
e : ContinuousLinearMap (RingHom.id 𝕜) 𝕜 F
⊢ HasDerivAtFilter (⇑e) (e 1) x L
decl:
protected theorem ContinuousLinearMap.hasDerivAtFilter : HasDerivAtFilter e (e 1) x L :=
  e.hasFDerivAtFilter.hasDerivAtFilter

initialProofState:

name: ContinuousLinearMap.deriv
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u
inst✝² : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
F : Type v
inst✝¹ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
x : 𝕜
e : ContinuousLinearMap (RingHom.id 𝕜) 𝕜 F
⊢ Eq (deriv (⇑e) x) (e 1)
decl:
@[simp]
protected theorem ContinuousLinearMap.deriv : deriv e x = e 1 :=
  e.hasDerivAt.deriv

name: ContinuousLinearMap.derivWithin
initialProofState:

⊢ Eq (derivWithin (⇑e) s x) (e 1)
decl:
protected theorem ContinuousLinearMap.derivWithin (hxs : UniqueDiffWithinAt 𝕜 s x) :
    derivWithin e s x = e 1 :=
  e.hasDerivWithinAt.derivWithin hxs
